text:
reads across each window of data and prepares an internal representation of the window.
When applied to time series classiﬁcation like HAR, CNN has two advantages over
other models: local dependency and scale invariance. Local dependency means the
nearby signals in HAR are likely to be correlated, while scale invariance refers to
the scale-invariant for diﬀerent paces or frequencies.
— Deep Learning for Sensor-based Activity Recognition: A Survey , 2018.
